CustomField.description: Indicates if this User Story is considered a Business Disrupting Failure (i.e. a P0 or P1 severity issue)
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(TEXT(cml_Severity__c) == 'P0 - Blocker - Business Disruption', TEXT(cml_Severity__c) == 'P1 - Critical - No Workaround'), true, false)
CustomField.label: Is Business Disruption Failure
